channel.title: I need Javascript + Mootools help
channel.description:
Okay is there anyone thats willing to help me implement some [url=http://www.mootools.net]Mootools[/url] script onto a webpage. I just need to know how to place it on a blank page then i can go from there.
Incase you didnt know, Mootools is this VERY amazing javascript stuff, and it's free. I'm just a noob and i can't figure out how to find the scripts.
I only need to know how to get one script from the Mootools script thing then put it on a blank HTML page (I can do this with my own javascript it's just I don't understand Mootools).
I've blabbered on a bit but please help me!
